dk.statsbiblioteket.util.rpc
Class StaticConnectionFactory<E>

java.lang.Object
  dk.statsbiblioteket.util.rpc.ConnectionFactory<E>
      dk.statsbiblioteket.util.rpc.StaticConnectionFactory<E>

public class StaticConnectionFactory<E>
extends ConnectionFactory<E>

A ConnectionFactory always returning a reference to the same connection object. This can be used to do "local rpc" with method calls dispatching to an object within the same JVM.

Constructor Detail

Method Detail

createConnection

public E createConnection(java.lang.String connectionId)
Description copied from class: ConnectionFactory

Create a connection of type E to a named resource. The connectionId is an implementation specific id - which in case of RMI backends could be the RMI service address.

If the connection fails it should be retried ConnectionFactory.connectionRetries number of times with a grace time of ConnectionFactory.graceTime seconds in between.

Specified by:
createConnection in class ConnectionFactory<E>
Parameters:
connectionId - opaque implementation specific identifier
Returns:
A connection
